website_summaries.verdict: This pack of 3 razors each feature 4 flexible blades, soothing moisture strips enriched with shea butter, and scented handles with rubber grips.
pros: We love the beautiful colors in each package

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors, great price, precise shave!
customer_reviews.text: Soleil Bella are the only razors I will use. Perfect grip, sharp, great blades and contour. And the colors are super cute, usually they only come in blue shades at the store. Definitely recommend. Have been using them for going on 6 years now! Won’t use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Wren

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Razors
customer_reviews.text: My favorite razors. Nice and smooth shave, doesn’t nick or pull. I’ve bought so many Bic Soleil razors trying to find this exact one that I stumbled on a few years ago. Really happy to find these on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: kmbrlymarie

customer_reviews.title: Great razors
customer_reviews.text: Really great deal for the money, definitely a better deal than in store! I love these razors, for some reason the 4 blade ones work best for me and the Soleil brand in particular is one of the only brands that the comfort strip doesn't give me hives! My favorite razors for sure
customer_reviews.author: Kaylove

customer_reviews.title: Great razor
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite razors! I get razor burn easily, and to date these and the 3 blade sensitive skin BIC are the only ones that don’t bother me, and they’re about impossible to find locally. Great value for a large quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Do these Work for anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Might as well had gone to the dollar store. This cut me and barely shaved any hair. I guess i better stick with Bic twilight which does an ok decent job until i find one that i will be happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Great smooth razor
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. These razor shave very well & do not nick your skin. My only complaint is I was to get 10 & there were only 9 in the pack. I am definitely ordering theses again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kitner

customer_reviews.title: Best razor for women
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is the best razor I’ve used. No cuts or marks left on my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Special Kay

customer_reviews.title: best razor around
customer_reviews.text: love theses for shaveing my face. I can use one for almost up to 1 month using everyday..
customer_reviews.author: Michael Huculak

customer_reviews.title: Smooth skin!
customer_reviews.text: Easy shave! Don’t have to toss after one use! It’s actually good for multiple uses and works perfectly, no cuts just smooth skin!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Africa

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I love them I won’t buy anything else. They’re great value. I Get at least 30 shaves.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie Bolton

customer_reviews.title: A reasonable price and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: These have become my favorite razors by far. Reasonable price and they last over the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hulsey

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love these razors the best. Smooth shave. Great economy package.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsarmbo2

customer_reviews.title: value for the money
customer_reviews.text: dont really like this shaver but ehh value for the money and comes with ALOT. so I mean that's duable
customer_reviews.author: jessi

customer_reviews.title: Long time user of these razors
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap and effective. I had to buy this big pack because I know I can use them for a long time and save money. You should get these!
customer_reviews.author: Jellybeans

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold and very close shave. Better than I have had in a long time
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Hair be gone
customer_reviews.text: World like a charm after 2 weeks of now shaving. Even my husband's go to razor!
customer_reviews.author: A. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE! They give a very good shave
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE! They give a very good shave, and are very comfortable in the hand. As a side note, they dont smell at all but thats fine with me
customer_reviews.author: Brenda W

customer_reviews.title: Great razor for a great price
customer_reviews.text: These razors are great. Easy to hold so I never have any cuts or scrapes. The blade stays sharp for long than most disposable razors.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Glassmoyer

customer_reviews.title: Canceled my auto renew. These are terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Is not at all a close shave. Rite aid brand razors are better than these. Cancelled my auto pay but unfortunately have 2 packs of these. Almost the worst razor I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Decent rasors for the price..... ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent rasors for the price ..... I never find the replaceable cartridge type to be very cost effective ..... theses do the job well enugh.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good pack of razors for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good value, just wish the swivel head was a little more ergonomic.
customer_reviews.author: L.G.

customer_reviews.title: A staple.
customer_reviews.text: An everyday staple and a cost-friendly option. These are great razors.
customer_reviews.author: raedueck

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Razors were great. 4 blades cut my time in half. I didn't have to go over my under arms more than twice . These are good for all your bushes. However, the price has gone up. I guess a good thing doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate Drop

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Usually I have to replace the razor after a few uses but this one seems to be going strong on over 5 uses with just 1 of the 3 I purchased
customer_reviews.author: Karly Lutz

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: Smelled so bad it made me gag. Worst idea ever.
customer_reviews.author: Meg .H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Four blades so much better than 3. Easier to shave and easier to keep smooth.
customer_reviews.author: gal3

customer_reviews.title: My favorite razors and cheapest on amazon
customer_reviews.text: I only use the bic 4 blade razors. They shave everything very well and can be used a few times before disposing. Amazon is usually the cheapest place to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: BIC RAZORS
customer_reviews.text: WORK GREAT. LAST A GOOD TIME. WELL WORTH THE COST. MANY THANKS
customer_reviews.author: LINDA   -   Puyallup, WA

customer_reviews.title: Less product than advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product came with 8 razors and not 10 as displayed on the package. The package was not opened but the number of product was incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, been using them for a couple of years!! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: kristi terry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used them before so i know how good they are. :)
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: No razor burn
customer_reviews.text: They are gentle and last for a week or so
customer_reviews.author: pinkshoes

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: Does not give as close of a shave as the 3-blade bic soleil
customer_reviews.author: Catherine F. Howe

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I like these razors above any others on the market. I use these to shave legs and my face.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Baxter

customer_reviews.title: BIC razors
customer_reviews.text: I really love how these razors dont break also the are smooth shaving and very gentle on your skin and thank you very much i will always use these
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: I was happy to find them on Amazon when I didn't feel ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the only razors I buy. The four blade are perfectly sharp enough but cheaper than the five blade. I was happy to find them on Amazon when I didn't feel like shopping in stores. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I used these 10 years ago and switched for some reason. I've been trying various razers ever since and just haven't been satisfied with anything more or less expensive. Honestly, I pretty much stopped shaving altogether. With summer coming up, I decided to give these another go and they are amazing! Smooth, close shave. Easy to hold, light and not slippery. Navigates easily around ankles/knees/bikini line.
customer_reviews.author: Matti

customer_reviews.title: The best razor ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bic Soeil four blade razors have been my go to razor for years. They are perfect. I have tried so many other razors. Bic four blade are the best shave (no missing spots), good value as they last through several shaves, easy to hold and durable. The perfect razor.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Andre Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best razors for women
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite razors. If you keep them dry and rinse out after use, you can use 1 for up to 1 month- and I am very hairy (legs and underarms). I have been using this brand about 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I normally use Bic Sensitive (2blade) razors, thought I’d try these. I’m disappointed. Shaved this morning, not any better/closer shave than my cheapie 2 blades. Also, I never get razor rash, but I got one today.
customer_reviews.author: Kray

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic razor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were not too expensive, not really paying attention to any features or anything, figuring a razor is a razor. After using this razor I am hooked. It was so incredibly easy to use. It just glides. I love this razor.
customer_reviews.author: PTSDiva

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best razors out there. The gel is minimal but I prefer that to get a close shave, there is something about a 4th blade that makes it so much better than 3!
customer_reviews.author: Jjmm

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: I've cut myself several times. Not impressed as a safety razor.
customer_reviews.author: pxn

customer_reviews.title: Best Razors EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best razors available. Smooth close shave guaranteed with no razor burn! My local store stopped carrying these so I will be purchasing them from here now on. Better price than store too.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great Shave
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these and she likes them, she uses a moisturizer cream and gets very minimal cuts and burn. They cut close to the skin so the shave last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Eno

customer_reviews.title: Best Razors
customer_reviews.text: These are the best razors on the market. They cut so well!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bunnell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These razors really are the best kind of razors to buy. They work perfectly and can last for quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kiaya

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Each one of these lasts at least a month. Never cuts or leaves bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like these
customer_reviews.text: Like these better than the cheaper disposable razor. Much smoother shave.
customer_reviews.author: Brett & Afton Compton

customer_reviews.title: ... three times what these do and isn’t half as good. Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: I have a razor that cost three times what these do and isn’t half as good. Does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: kristie sams

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: This razor is one of the best I've ever used...Just glides over skin taking "wiskers" away...
customer_reviews.author: JESSE

customer_reviews.title: Cancelled
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get this. It was canceled because a garden nozzle was cancelled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These razors dull and rust easily, but they are inexpensive so you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Heymann

customer_reviews.title: better than the dollar shave club
customer_reviews.text: Love the subscribe and save - cheaper and more convenient than dollar shave club!
customer_reviews.author: odie

customer_reviews.title: ... only razors I found that don't make my legs super irritated. I did the Goldilocks trial and error ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the only razors I found that don't make my legs super irritated. I did the Goldilocks trial and error of how many blades I really need in a razor and these were the one's that were just right.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite..
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite...edge is a bit sharp and if you drop it, it will break in half and be worthless....
customer_reviews.author: Cher S

customer_reviews.title: So smooth now! (:
customer_reviews.text: For disposable razors these are perfect! My legs feel like a babies bottom! So smooth! (:
customer_reviews.author: Devinne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite razors! Love the 4 blade versus 3. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B Gallaher

customer_reviews.title: A little dry
customer_reviews.text: Not as lubricating as I would have liked. But scent is awesome
customer_reviews.author: P. Winkler

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty terrible. It would suffice in a pinch but ...
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty terrible. It would suffice in a pinch but I'll never use them again. Shaving just one day of leg hair growth left my legs covered in razor bumps.
customer_reviews.author: kmkmk

customer_reviews.title: Missing the 4th razor...
customer_reviews.text: Only 3 in the package (4blade razors). Bought two packs and both came with 3 razors each without the extra 5 blade razor.
customer_reviews.author: Kd Sullivan

product_meta.title: BIC Soleil Bella Sun-Twist Scented Women's 4 Blade Disposable Razor, 3-Count
product_meta.description: Size:3 Count| Style Name:Sun-Twist ScentBIC Soleil Bella Sun-Twist Scented razors feature four flexible blades, soothing moisture strips enriched with Shea butter and sun-twist scented handles with rubber grips for ultimate comfort. Each package contains three razors.
feature_bullets: 4 flexible E Z rinse blades adjust to all your curves
Soothing moisture strip enriched with Shea butter
Pivoting head and rubber grip for ultimate comfort

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
